Public Attributes

int(* beginTrackProc )(struct MIDIFileParser_s *parser, int index, int trackSize)
 Called by MIDIFile_Parse() when the beginning of a track is encountered.
int(* endTrackProc )(struct MIDIFileParser_s *parser, int index)
 Called by MIDIFile_Parse() when the end of a track is encountered.
int(* handleEventProc )(struct MIDIFileParser_s *parser, int ticks, int command, int data1, int data2)
 Called by MIDIFile_Parse() when regular MIDI event, like a NoteOn, is encountered.
int(* handleMetaEventProc )(struct MIDIFileParser_s *parser, int ticks, int type, const unsigned char *addr, int numBytes)
 Called by MIDIFile_Parse() when MetaEvent, like a Tempo or Copyright event, is encountered.
int(* handleSysExProc )(struct MIDIFileParser_s *parser, int ticks, int type, const unsigned char *addr, int numBytes)
 Called by MIDIFile_Parse() when System Exclusive event is encountered.

 Pointer to a memory image of a MIDI File.

 Number of bytes in the "file".

 How many bytes have been read by the parser.

 MIDI File format: 0,1 or 2.

 Number of NoteOn commands encountered.
int noteOffCount
 Number of NoteOff commands encountered.

 Flag set to true when MIDI_META_END_OF_TRACK MetaEvent encountered.

Member Data Documentation

int(* MIDIFileParser_s::beginTrackProc)(struct MIDIFileParser_s *parser, int index, int trackSize)

Called by MIDIFile_Parse() when the beginning of a track is encountered.

int(* MIDIFileParser_s::endTrackProc)(struct MIDIFileParser_s *parser, int index)

Called by MIDIFile_Parse() when the end of a track is encountered.

int(* MIDIFileParser_s::handleEventProc)(struct MIDIFileParser_s *parser, int ticks, int command, int data1, int data2)

Called by MIDIFile_Parse() when regular MIDI event, like a NoteOn, is encountered.

int(* MIDIFileParser_s::handleMetaEventProc)(struct MIDIFileParser_s *parser, int ticks, int type, const unsigned char *addr, int numBytes)

Called by MIDIFile_Parse() when MetaEvent, like a Tempo or Copyright event, is encountered.

int(* MIDIFileParser_s::handleSysExProc)(struct MIDIFileParser_s *parser, int ticks, int type, const unsigned char *addr, int numBytes)

Called by MIDIFile_Parse() when System Exclusive event is encountered.

const unsigned char* MIDIFileParser_s::imageStart

Pointer to a memory image of a MIDI File.

int MIDIFileParser_s::imageSize

Number of bytes in the "file".

int MIDIFileParser_s::bytesRead

How many bytes have been read by the parser.

int MIDIFileParser_s::format

MIDI File format: 0,1 or 2.

int MIDIFileParser_s::numTracks

Number of tracks read from header.

int MIDIFileParser_s::ticksPerBeat

Number of ticks in a quarter note read from header.

int MIDIFileParser_s::ticksPerSecond

Tick rate, updated by Tempo MetaEvents.

int MIDIFileParser_s::sampleRate

Sample rate of synthesis engine.

int MIDIFileParser_s::lastCommand

Used to parse running status.

int MIDIFileParser_s::noteOnCount

Number of NoteOn commands encountered.

This can be used to detect hung notes or other file errors.

int MIDIFileParser_s::noteOffCount

Number of NoteOff commands encountered.

void* MIDIFileParser_s::userData

User can store data in the parser and use it in the callback functions.

char MIDIFileParser_s::gotEndOfTrack

Flag set to true when MIDI_META_END_OF_TRACK MetaEvent encountered.
